name: r2papi
description: r2api on top of r2pipe for typescript and js
author: pancake@nopcode.org

scripts.build: cd sync && tsc -m node16 --target es2020 --declaration r2pipe.ts base64.ts ai.ts r2papi.ts esil.ts shell.ts
scripts.abuild: cd async && tsc -m node16 --target es2020 --declaration r2pipe.ts base64.ts ai.ts r2papi.ts esil.ts shell.ts
scripts.adoc: cd async && typedoc r2pipe.ts ai.ts r2papi.ts base64.ts shell.ts esil.ts
scripts.sdoc: cd sync && typedoc r2pipe.ts ai.ts r2papi.ts base64.ts shell.ts esil.ts
